PageTitle: nat log user keepalive enable syslog type3
FuncDef:
The nat log user keepalive enable syslog type3 command enables the Keepalive log function for NAT users.
The undo nat log user keepalive enable syslog type3 command disables the Keepalive log function for NAT users.
This function is disabled by default.
CLIs: nat log user keepalive enable syslog type3
undo nat log user keepalive enable syslog type3
Examples: [~HUAWEI] nat log user keepalive enable syslog type3
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable the Keepalive log function for NAT users, run the nat log user keepalive enable syslog type3 command. The Keepalive log function is used for logs in type 3 format. The logs cannot be sent using a no-PAT address pool.
Precautions
The nat log user keepalive enable syslog type3 command takes effect only on the VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
